name: TriPeaks Solitaire card game
description:
Play the Tri Peak Solitaire card game where you match cards arranged in three pyramid shapes. Clear as much decks as you can to get a high score!

Multiple card and background patterns to chose from
A two level difficulty system, which also keep tracks of high scores against each
User stats that tracks max score
A hint system that shows possible moves
An auto play mode where you can sit back, relax and watch the computer play the game by itself
Game is not timed, so you can take as much time as you like
No ads or In App purchases

How to play?
In this game, one deck of cards (without the Joker cards) are shuffled and arranged in three pyramid shapes. All cards on bottom of pyramid are placed face up, while the others are placed face down. The last card after forming the pyramid is called the top card and is placed face up below the pyramid shape. The remaining cards are placed left of top card, all in one stack and face down.
The objective of the game is to clear all the cards forming the pyramid shape by matching the open cards to the top card. A match can be made when the open card value is one less or one more than the top card. When a match happens, it can be moved to the bottom as a top card, and the existing top card is discarded. If none can be matched, the card from the stack can be moved as the top card.
For detailed instructions on how to play, please click on the help button inside the game screen.
